name: face-detector
description: ```sh 	docker build -t face-detector . 	docker run -it -v $(pwd):/face-detector face-detector 	docker run -p 9000:9000 -p 8000:8000 -it -v $(pwd):/face-detector face-detector 	docker run -p 9000:9000 -p 8000:8000 -it -v $(pwd):/face-detector face-detector /bin/bash -l -c '/root/openface/demos/web/start-servers.sh' ```
